Verses: 1 pinbu, Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Paarvonidaththil Poi: Enakku Aaraadhanai Seyya En Janangalaip Pogavidu.
2 nee Avargalai Vidamaatten Endru Innum Niruththi Vaiththaayaagil,
3 karththarudaiya Karam Veliyilirukkira Un Mirugajeevangalaagiya Kudhiraigalinmelum Kazhudhaigalinmelum Ottagangalinmelum Aadumaadugalin Melum Irukkum; Magaa Kodidhaana Kollainoi Undaagum.
4 karththar Isravelarin Mirugajeevangalukkum Egipthiyarin Mirugajeevangalukkum Viththiyaasam Pannuvaar; Isravel Puththirarukku Uriyavaigal Ellaavatrilum Ondrum Saavadhillai Endraar.

5 melum, Naalaikkuk Karththar Indhak Kaariyaththai Dhesaththil Seyvaar Endru Solli, Karththar Oru Kaalaththaik Kuriththaar Endrum, Ebireyarudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar Endrum Avanidaththil Sol Endraar.
6 marunaalil Karththar Andhak Kaariyaththaich Seydhaar; Egipthiyarudaiya Mirugajeevangal Ellaam Seththuppoyitru; Isravel Puththirarin Mirugajeevangalil Ondraagilum Saagavillai.
7 paarvon Visaariththu, Isravelarin Mirugajeevangalil Ondraagilum Saagavillai Endru Arindhaan. Paarvonudaiya Irudhayamo Kadinappattadhu; Avan Janangalaip Pogavidavillai.
8 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki: Ungal Kaippidi Niraiya Soolaiyin Saambalai Allik Kollungal; Mose Adhaip Paarvonudaiya Kangalukkumun Vaanaththirku Neraaga Iraikkakkadavan.
9 adhu Egipthu Dhesam Meedhengum Thoosiyaagi, Egipthu Dhesamengum Manidhar Melum Miruga Jeevangal Melum Eripandhamaana Koppulangalai Ezhumbap Pannum Endraar.

10 appadiye Avargal Soolaiyin Saambalai Allikkondu, Paarvonukku Munbaaga Vandhu Nindraargal. Mose Adhai Vaanaththukku Neraaga Iraiththaan; Appozhudhu Manidhar Melum Miruga Jeevangal Melum Eripandhamaana Koppulangal Ezhumbitru.
11 andhak Koppulangal Mandhiravaadhigal Melum Egipthiyar Ellaar Melum Undaanadhinaal, Andhak Koppulangal Nimiththam Mandhiravaadhigalum Mosekku Munbaaga Nirkak Koodaadhirundhadhu.
12 aanaalum, Karththar Moseyode Solliyirundhabadiye, Karththar Paarvonin Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththinaar; Avan Avargalukkuch Sevikodukkavillai.
13 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Adhigaalame Ezhundhirundhu Poi, Paarvonukku Munbaaga Nindru; Enakku Aaraadhanai Seyya En Janangalai Anuppividu.

14 vidaadhirundhaal, Boomiyengum Ennaip Pola Veroruvarum Illai Enbadhai Nee Ariyumbadikku, Indhamurai Naan Sagalavidha Vaadhaigalaiyum Un Irudhayaththilum, Un Oozhiyakkaarar Melum Un Janangal Melum Anuppuven.
15 nee Boomiyil Iraamal Naasamaaip Pogumbadi Naan En Kaiyai Neetti, Unnaiyum Un Janangalaiyum Kollai Noyinaal Vaadhippen.
16 ennudaiya Vallamaiyai Unnidaththil Kaanbikkumbadiyaagavum, En Naamam Boomiyilengum Pirasdhaabamaagumbadiyaagavum Unnai Nilainiruththinen.
17 nee En Janangalaip Pogavidaamal, Innum Avargalukku Virodhamaai Unnai Uyarththugiraayaa?
18 egipthu Thondriya Naalmudhal Idhuvaraikkum Adhil Peyyaadha Migavum Kodiya Kalmazhaiyai Naalai Inneram Peyyap Pannuven.

19 ippozhudhe Aal Anuppi, Un Miruga Jeevangalaiyum Veliyil Unakku Irukkira Yaavaiyum Serththukkol; Veettile Serkkappadaamal Veliyilirukkum Ovvoru Manidhanum Mirugamum Seththuppogaththakkadhaai Andhak Kalmazhai Peyyum Endru Ebireyarin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Avanukkuch Sol Endraar
20 paarvonudaiya Oozhiyakkaararil Evan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaikkup Bayappattaano, Avan Than Velaikkaararaiyum Than Mirugajeevangalaiyum Veetugalukku Odivarap Panninaan.
21 evan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Madhiyaamal Ponaano, Avan Than Velaikkaararaiyum Than Mirugajeevangalaiyum Veliyile Vittuvittaan.

22 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Egipthu Dhesam Engum Manidhar Melum Mirugajeevangal Melum Egipthu Dhesaththilirukkira Sagalavidhamaana Payirvagaigal Melum Kal Mazhai Peyya, Un Kaiyai Vaanaththirku Neraaga Neettu Endraar.

23 appadiye Mose Than Kolai Vaanaththirku Neraaga Neettinaan. Appozhudhu Karththar Idimuzhakkangalaiyum Kalmazhaiyaiyum Anuppinaar; Akkini Tharaiyinmel Vegamaai Otitru, Egipthu Dhesaththinmel Karththar Kalmazhaiyaip Peyyappanninaar.
24 kalmazhaiyum Kalmazhaiyode Kalandha Akkiniyum Migavum Kodidhaayirundhadhu; Egipthu Dhesam Kudiyetrappatta Naalmudhal Adhil Appadi Orupodhum Undaanadhillai.

25 egipthudhesam Engum Manidharaiyum Mirugajeevangalaiyum, Veliyile Irundhavaigal Evaigalo Avaigal Ellaavatraiyum Andhak Kalmazhai Azhiththuppottadhu; Adhu Veliyin Payirvagaigalaiyellaam Azhiththu, Veliyin Marangalaiyellaam Muriththuppottadhu.
26 isravel Puththirar Irundha Kosen Naattilemaaththiram Kalmazhai Illaadhirundhadhu.
27 appozhudhu Paarvon Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Azhaippiththu; Naan Indha Murai Paavam Seydhen; Karththar Needhiyullavar; Naanum En Janamum Thunmaarkkar.
28 idhupodhum; Indha Magaa Iditimuzhakkangalum Kalmazhaiyum Ozhiyumbadikku, Karththarai Nokki Vinnappam Pannungal; Naan Ungalai Pogaviduven, Ini Ungalukkuth Thadai Illai Endraan.

29 mose Avanai Nokki: Naan Pattanaththilirundhu Purappattavudane, En Kaikalaik Karththarukku Neraaga Virippen; Appozhudhu Idimuzhakkangal Oindhu Kalmazhai Nindrupom: Adhinaal Boomi Karththarudaiyadhu Enbadhai Neer Ariveer.
30 aagilum Neerum Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Innum Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayappadamaatteergal Enbadhai Ariven Endraan.
31 appozhudhu Vaarkodhumai Kadhirppayirum Sanal Thaalppayirumaayirundhadhu; Adhinaal Sanalum Vaarkodhumaiyum Azhikkappattuppoyitru.
32 kodhumaiyum Kambum Kadhirvidaadhirundhadhaal, Avaigal Azhikkappadavillai.
33 mose Paarvonai Vittup Pattanaththilirundhu Purappattu, Than Kaigalaik Karththarukku Neraaga Viriththaan; Appozhudhu Idimuzhakkamum Kalmazhaiyum Nindradhu; Mazhaiyum Boomiyil Peyyaamalirundhadhu.
34 mazhaiyum Kalmazhaiyum Idimuzhakkamum Nindruponadhaip Paarvon Kandapodhu, Avanum Avan Oozhiyakkaararum Pinnum Paavam Seydhu, Thangal Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththinaargal.
35 karththar Moseyaik Kondu Solliyirundhapadiye, Paarvonin Irudhayam Kadinappattadhu; Avan Isravel Puththiraraip Pogavidavillai.
